Package oh_hecc.game_parts.metadata

Class EditableMetadata

java.lang.Object
oh_hecc.game_parts.metadata.EditableMetadata
All Implemented Interfaces:
MetadataEditingInterface, MetadataReadingInterface, SharedMetadata, Heccable, Parseable
public class EditableMetadata extends Object implements MetadataEditingInterface, MetadataReadingInterface
A class that represents the Metadata (except it's editable instead)

  • Field Details

    • title

      private String title
      what the game title is. defaults to "An Interactive Fiction"

    • author

      private String author
      author name. "Anonymous" by default

    • startPassage

      private String startPassage
      The starting passage. defaults to "Start" if undefined

    • ifid

      private String ifid
      The IFID. empty by default

    • variables

      private final ArrayList<Variable> variables
      All the variable definitions

    • comment

      private String comment
      The multline comment held within the metadata. empty by default

  • Constructor Details

    • EditableMetadata

      private EditableMetadata()
      No-argument constructor, only called by the other constructors, that initialises stuff to default values

    • EditableMetadata

      public EditableMetadata​(String theTitle, String theAuthor)
      Metadata constructor that takes an author name and a game title as a constructor Will only be used when creating a completely new HECC file
      Parameters:
      theTitle - title of the game
      theAuthor - author name

    • EditableMetadata

      public EditableMetadata​(String rawMetadata)
      EditableMetadata constructor that takes raw .hecc metadata as a constructor, and uses that to construct this
      Parameters:
      rawMetadata - the raw hecc metadata that this will be built from

    • generateIFIDString

      private static String generateIFIDString()

      Returns:
      a string with a new UUID (in uppercase)

      public boolean updateTitle​(String newTitle) throws InvalidMetadataDeclarationException
      Attempts to update the title of the game
      Specified by:
      updateTitle in interface MetadataEditingInterface
      Parameters:
      newTitle - the new title being used
      Returns:
      true if the new title was valid (and the title could be changed)
      Throws:
      InvalidMetadataDeclarationException - if newTitle is invalid

      Specified by:
      updateAuthor in interface MetadataEditingInterface
      Parameters:
      newAuthor - the new value for the 'author' field
      Returns:
      true if the 'author' was updated successfully
      Throws:
      InvalidMetadataDeclarationException - if the given 'newAuthor' is not a valid 'author' input
